quote.issuer_name: Wisdom Wealth Resources Investment Holding Group Ltd.
quote.nm: Wisdom Wealth Resources Investment Holding Group Ltd.
quote.summary: Wisdom Wealth Resources Investment Holding Group Ltd, formerly Hong Kong Finance Investment Holding Group Ltd, is an investment holding company principally engaged in the distribution of electronic products. Along with subsidiaries, the Company operates its business through four segments. The Trading Business segment sells electronic products, engages in the trading and import and export of electronic products. The Financial Business segment is engaged in the provision of financial services, including stockbroking, futures and options broking, among others. The Property Investment segment is engaged in leasing properties. The Mineral Mining, Oil and Gas Business segment is engaged in the exploration and production of minerals, oil and natural gas. In addition, the Company is also engaged in the trading of natural resources and petrochemicals.
quote.office_address:
Units 1901 & 1917, 19th Floor
China Merchants Tower
Shun Tak Centre
168-200 Connaught Rd C, HK
